wikipedia_page.main: Richard Henderson  (born 19 July 1945) is a Scottish molecular biologist and biophysicist and pioneer in the field of electron microscopy of biological molecules. Henderson shared the Nobel Prize in Chemistry in 2017 with Jacques Dubochet and Joachim Frank.

response: ** Richard Henderson, Scottish molecular biologist, Nobel Prize laureate
* Chemistry – Jacques Dubochet, Joachim Frank and Richard Henderson
